Package be.ac.umons.util

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BackgroundActor
    Actor that draws a background
    BackgroundDrawable
    Class to be used as background for a table
    Pair<T,S>
    Class representing a couple of two objects
    Pos
    A position is represented by x and y values
    PosEdge
    A Couple of Pos and edge
    Segment
    A segment contains initial and final positions, initial and final intensities and an array of colors
    Settings
    Class containing the settings of this game
    State
    This class allow to encapsulate the current state of a playing level
    Tile
    Couple of an edge and an id corresponding to a tile
    User

    This class contains all registered users and allow to do operations on theses users.
